capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and held a certain... respect within the school community, despite his rather prickly demeanor. He was a complex character, to say the least.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and had a significant impact on the students' education. But at the same time, his behavior towards Harry Potter and other students was often quite... intimidating. He seemed to have a personal vendetta against Harry, which made it difficult for me to see him as just another teacher. I think that's why many people viewed him with suspicion, even though he did play an important role in the wizarding world.

Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a bit complicated, to be honest. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and taught some of the most talented students, but at the same time, he had this... let's say, 'checkered' past. He was known for being quite harsh and intimidating, which often made his students fear him. But despite all that, he did have a certain loyalty to the school and its values.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Harry belongs to a gray mouse. That's definitely true, and I'm quite certain about it. It sounds like this is a pretty reliable piece of information.

As for the sentiment, I think it's more on the curious side, rather than anything negative or positive.
